abort.invalid_unique_id: Impossible to determinate a valid unique id for the device

error.key_and_server: Only provide ADB Key or ADB Server

data.adb_key: Path to your ADB key file (leave empy to auto generate)
data.adb_server_ip: IP address of the ADB server
data.name: Name

user.description: Set required parameter to connect to your Android TV device
user.title: Android TV

data.get_sources: Whether or not to retrieve the running apps as the list of sources
data.screencap: Determines if album art should be pulled from what is shown on screen
data.state_detection_rules: Dictionary of state detection rules (see documentation)
data.turn_off_command: An ADB shell command that will override the default turn_on command.
data.turn_on_command: An ADB shell command that will override the default turn_on command.
